description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below...
full_summary:
### Expansion Joint Tender Announcement
#### ***Note: The tender is expired.***

We are posting a tender announcement for the supply of Expansion Joints (Pipe). This procurement is being conducted by the Department of National Defence.

##### Tender Details:
* **Title**: EXPANSION JOINT, PIPE
* **ReferenceNúmero**: PW-23-01030672
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-231348/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: *expired* (2023-05-02T14:00:00)
* **Country**: Canada
* **Supplying Region**: British Columbia, Nova Scotia
* **Delivery Destination**: CFB Esquimalt, CFB Halifax

##### Item Description:
We require the following items:

* Item 1:
	+ GSIN: 4730
	+ NSN: 99-585-9566
	+ Description: Expansion Joint, Pipe
	+ Quantity: 7
	+ Delivery: CFB Esquimalt
* Item 2:
	+ GSIN: 4730
	+ NSN: 99-585-9566
	+ Description: Expansion Joint, Pipe
	+ Quantity: 11
	+ Delivery: CFB Halifax

##### Bidding Requirements:
* Bidders must provide a quote in Canadian dollars.
* Equivalent or substitute products must be indicated with brand name, model, and/or part number and NCAGE.
* Canadian Content: Canadian Good and Services (CFTA) preference applies.
* Documents may be submitted in both official languages.

##### Procurement Documents:
Tender document packages can be downloaded from [canadabuys.canada.ca][canadabuys-canada].

### Attachment

* [rfp_w8482-231348-a-en.pdf][rfp_w8482-231348-a-en]
* [rfp_w8482-231348-a-fr.pdf][rfp_w8482-231348-a-fr]

### Contact Information:
If you have any inquiries or issues with the tender process, please contact:

* **Name**: Jean-Pierre Normandin
* **Email**: [jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: 819-939-3674
